DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy of intensive lipid-lowering therapy with Lipitor on the changes of characteristics of yellow coronary plaque in subjects with hypercholesteremia accompanying coronary artery disease
DOC.brief_title: Lipitor Phase 4 Clinical Trial in Hypercholesteremia Patients With Yellow Coronary Plaque
DOC.criteria: Patients with hypercholesteremia The indication of coronary angiography, coronary angioscopy and intravascular ultrasound are expected Patients who has current administration of Lipitor or history of discontinued administration of Lipitor Acute cardiac infarction
